metadata.synopsis: A dialogue with one of the "guards" in House of Hope. These are Eternal Debtors, each one has a story how did they manage to get into Raphael's hands. ImpDebtors behave a bit differently: they observe everyone and will watch at players constantly.These characters see players as "guests" of House of Hope and they don't know anything about players.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Talk to Hope in House of Hope and promise to helpteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_HopeIntroduction_Trigger3. Talk to Eternal Debtorteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_ImpDebtor04

0.speaker: Devoured Eternal Debtor
0.text: Teeth, claws. They want out. They want out of me!
0.context: NodeContext: Doubled over in pain, rats are swen inside him.

1.speaker: Devoured Eternal Debtor
1.text: They're eating me from the inside. The rats, the rats, the rats!
1.context: NodeContext: Doubled over in pain, rats are swen inside him.
